title: Can't connect to authentication servers
body:
I don't know whats going on but when i first log into my client everything is fine, but later on in the day if i try to get back on it tells me i cant connect to authentication servers. Then when i try to click of the support link i cant even connect to the website (https://gyazo.com/e71f3d1c2392c830eb5f42c7398d70ce). Every other program/game/browsers/anything that needs the internet works fine even while im having this issue. I've looked at heaps of other issues like this on these boards and cant find anything to help. 

Someone help please. Getting over not knowing whats going on.

replies.body:
I'm not a tech person, but I can point you here:
https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/LbPY3Rpr-experiencing-a-tech-problem-find-the-common-fixes-here#connection

You'll find most of the common connection related problems and how to fix them there.
